system.descriptionText: If Comrade is in Cohesion, the Character counts their Weapon has having the Accurate Quality for the next Single-Shot Ranged Attack they make. Cannot be used for weapons with Blast, Haywire, Inaccurate, Indirect, Scatter, Spray, Storm, or Twin-Linked Qualities, doesn't add extra damage if fired weapon doesn't deal damage.
